body.name: Bed Sheet Organizer and Storage Size Label Bands | Bed Sheets Set Organizers for Linen Closet Organization - Elastic Bedding Band Labels Sheet Keepers for Organizing Bedsheet (Queen 4PCs | Simple)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: 🛌 FIND YOUR SHEETS EASILY - ECOHomes’ bedsheet organizers and storage bands help you to easily identify your bedsheets, duvets and bedding sets! You no longer have to waste time figuring out the correct bedsheet, not to mention folding and storing them up again!

🛌 BED SHEET ORGANIZER FOR LINEN CLOSET - With these sheet keepers, you can tidy up your linen closet and have more space for sheet storage too. Choose from 4 different color and styles of the bed sheets organization bands. Comes in packs of 2 pieces, 4 pieces or 8/10 pieces

🛌 EASY TO USE - Fold your own bed sheets, pillow cases, protectors, mattress pads, duvets and linens as usual. Simply wrap around these easily identifiable sheet label bed band straps. Labeling and identifying your sheet sets have never been easier!

🛌 STRETCHABLE AND DURABLE - Strong elasticity ensures that it won’t sag over time. These stretchy bed sheet storage bands are perfect to store and identify bed sheets, pillow cases, duvets, blankets, towels and more!

🛌 QUALITY MATERIAL - The bed band comes in 4 sizes of KING, QUEEN, TWIN and FULL, or a mixed pack of 8 Pieces. Made from quality elastic band with high quality prints, use the bed sheets organizers and save yourself from piles of messy foldable bed sheets!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: ECOHomes Bed Sheet Bands ~ Find Your Linens Easily With ECOHomes Bed Sheet Organizer Bands ~

Suitable for different linen materials & thickness. You can conveniently use it for bed sheet sets, pillowcases, protectors, mattress pads and duvets! These bed sheet bands are in TWIN, FULL, QUEEN & KING labels, and available in 4PCs or 8PCs bundle. Simply grab the one that you need! Simply snug the bed sheet bands around your folded linens and store them away neatly in the closet! Get pampered with choices as ECOHomes' bed sheet bands are now available in both minimalistic black & white and cozy cream colors!

What Is This Product For? These bands can be used to wrap and identify your bed sheets sets including your pillow cases, duvets, mattress protectors, mattress pads and more! What Does The 2 Pcs Package Include? For 2 Pcs Package, it contains 2 pieces of either 'TWIN', 'FULL', 'QUEEN' and 'KING' bedding bands, suitable for you to organize and store your bed sheet sets. What Does The 4 Pcs Package Include? For 4 Pcs Package, it contains 4 pieces of bedding bands, enough for you to organize and store your bed sheet sets. Comes in 4 different labels of ‘TWIN’, ‘FULL’, ‘QUEEN’ and ‘KING’, simply get the size labels of your choice! What Does The 8 Pcs Bundle Include? For 8 Pcs Bundle, it contains 2 pieces of 'TWIN', 'FULL', 'QUEEN' and 'KING' bedding bands, suitable for you to organize and store your various bed sheet sets that are in different sizes! Will The Bed Sheet Keeper Organizer Bands Break Easily? ECOHomes’ sheet keepers are made of high-quality cotton and polyester stretchy bands. Each bed sheet organizer band is 1.57 inches wide, and will not tear, break or lose its elasticity even when stretched over a long period of time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great organization tool
reviews.reviewText: Love that the bands keep sheets together and shows the size of the sheets so you don’t have to dig through closet each time you change your sheets. Very organized and neat looking in closet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: They are a nice looking and very convenient to keep sheets organized

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This product is just what I needed to organize the sheet sets in my linen closet. I’ve tried other things but this is the very best. Easy to read, easy to use, durable and made me so happy to have these linens organized! Thank you!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great and Needed Bed sheet organziers
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased this item for my queen size bed sheets and it works wonderfully. I had a mess in my linen closet but these organziers helped me consolidate my sheets and keep them organized.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The cream color looks more blush in person
reviews.reviewText: Love the look and the function of these. I am in serious home organization mode and love anything that helps me stay more organized. I ordered the cream color in the queen and king. The cream color is more of a blush ton in person, which is worth noting, but certainly not a deal breaker. Nice and stretchy and fit all of my different sheet sets nicely.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for Organization
reviews.reviewText: These are great for organizing multiple sets of sheets and keeping the pieces of each set together. It helps the sheet sets fit compactly in a drawer as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I don’t know why it’s so impossible to figure out sheet sizes. Ours are always getting confused. This is a super simple fix and has made life easier.
Un edredón es muy grande para estás cintas. Estás cintas son para sábanas.
Great for keeping sheet sets and pillow cases together and distinguishing the size of the sheets with the size written on the band.

My sheets are stored in a chest and hence are stacked vertically on their ends (like how Marie Kondo stores t-shirts). These bands help the sheets keep their shape and form when folded and makes organisation so much easier 👌🏻

Love the Queen sized ones as they work very well however the Twin size is the exact same size as the queen which doesn’t logically make sense as twin sheets, even including pillow case, is far smaller.
